The artwork of Bellport High School student-artists Courtney Gerard, Patricia Prott and Tyler Walsh were selected from 388 submissions to exhibit at the Heckscher Museum’s Long Island’s Best Young Artists 2020 juried exhibit.... (more) Student-Artists Among Long Islandâs Best Slideshow Caption

img.alt: Life Skills Students Receive Cooperator Award
img.title: Life Skills Students Receive Cooperator Award
img.div:
Life Skills Students Receive Cooperator Award
Bellport High School’s Life Skills Program was awarded the Outstanding Cooperator Award, recognizing the students’ great work at the Cornell Cooperative Farm, located in Yaphank.
Teacher Jane Quatrale explained that students enrolled... (more) Life Skills Students Receive Cooperator Award Slideshow Caption

img.alt: South Country Named a Top Music Community
img.title: South Country Named a Top Music Community
img.div:
South Country Named a Top Music Community
The NAMM Foundation has designated the District as one of the nation’s 2020 Best Communities for Music Education for its demonstration of exceptionally high commitment to music education and access to music instruction for all district... (more) South Country Named a Top Music Community Slideshow Caption

img.alt: A Celebration of Excellence and Distinction
img.title: A Celebration of Excellence and Distinction
img.div:
A Celebration of Excellence and Distinction
Each year, Bellport High School demonstrates pride and gratitude during the Evening of Excellence. This cherished tradition, scheduled to take place on March 24, would have celebrated the accomplishments of 44 distinguished seniors who have... (more) A Celebration of Excellence and Distinction Slideshow Caption

img.alt: Student Musicians Attend Honor Band Symposium
img.title: Student Musicians Attend Honor Band Symposium
img.div:
Student Musicians Attend Honor Band Symposium
Bellport High School student-musicians Jack Burkhardt (clarinet), Taylor Kelly (horn) and Anthony Notartomaso (euphonium) were selected to represent the District at the 2020 New York State Band Directors Association High School Honor Band Symposium,... (more) Student Musicians Attend Honor Band Symposium Slideshow Caption
